20110113023113.000|20110113023118.000|CC1|>> THESE MEN AND WOMEN REMIND US
20110113023118.000|20110113023122.000|CC1|THAT HEROISM IS FOUND NOT ONLY  
20110113023122.000|20110113023127.000|CC1|ON THE FIELD ABOUT -- FIELDS OF 
20110113023127.000|20110113023128.000|CC1|BATTLE, THEY REMIND US THAT THIS
20110113023128.000|20110113023131.000|CC1|IS NOT REQUIRE SPECIAL TRAINING 
20110113023131.000|20110113023135.000|CC1|OR PHYSICAL STRENGTH, HER WISDOM
20110113023135.000|20110113023140.000|CC1|IS HERE IN THE HEARTS OF SO MANY
20110113023140.000|20110113023143.000|CC1|OF OUR FELLOW CITIZENS, ALL     
20110113023143.000|20110113023145.000|CC1|AROUND US JUST WAITING TO BE    
20110113023145.000|20110113023147.000|CC1|SUMMONED AS IT WAS ON SATURDAY  
20110113023147.000|20110113023154.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110113023154.000|20110113023156.000|CC1|THEIR ACTIONS, THEIR            
20110113023156.000|20110113023159.000|CC1|SELFLESSNESS POSES A CHALLENGE  
20110113023159.000|20110113023204.000|CC1|TO EACH OF US AND RAISES THE    
20110113023204.000|20110113023210.000|CC1|QUESTION OF WHAT BEYOND PARES --
20110113023210.000|20110113023211.000|CC1|PRAYERS AND EXPRESSIONS OF      
20110113023211.000|20110113023214.000|CC1|CONCERN IS REQUIRED OF US GOING 
20110113023214.000|20110113023218.000|CC1|FORWARD.                        
20110113023218.000|20110113023223.000|CC1|HOW CAN WE HONOR THE FALLEN?    
20110113023223.000|20110113023225.000|CC1|HOW CAN WE BE TRUE TO THEIR     
20110113023225.000|20110113023230.000|CC1|MEMORIES?                       
20110113023230.000|20110113023232.000|CC1|WHEN A TRAGEDY LIKE THIS        
20110113023232.000|20110113023237.000|CC1|STRIKES, THIS IS PART OF OUR    
20110113023237.000|20110113023241.000|CC1|NATURE TO DEMAND EXPLANATIONS   
20110113023241.000|20110113023243.000|CC1|AND TO TRY TO IMPOSE SOME ORDER 
20110113023243.000|20110113023246.000|CC1|ON THE CHAOS AND MAKES SENSE OUT
20110113023246.000|20110113023251.000|CC1|OF THAT WHICH SEEMS SENSELESS.  
20110113023251.000|20110113023253.000|CC1|ALREADY, WE HAVE SEEN THE       
20110113023253.000|20110113023255.000|CC1|NATIONAL CONVERSATION COMMENCE  
20110113023255.000|20110113023257.000|CC1|NOT ONLY ABOUT THE MOTIVATION   
20110113023257.000|20110113023300.000|CC1|BEHIND THESE KILLINGS BUT ABOUT 
20110113023300.000|20110113023302.000|CC1|EVERYTHING FROM THE MERITS OF   
20110113023302.000|20110113023304.000|CC1|GUN SAFETY LAWS TO THE ADEQUACY 
20110113023304.000|20110113023313.000|CC1|OF OUR MENTAL HEALTH FACILITIES.
20110113023313.000|20110113023315.000|CC1|MUCH OF THIS PROCESS OF DEBATING
20110113023315.000|20110113023317.000|CC1|ABOUT WHAT MIGHT BE DONE TO     
20110113023317.000|20110113023318.000|CC1|PREVENT SUCH TRAGEDIES IN THE

20110113023331.000|20110113023335.000|CC1|AT A TIME WHEN OUR DISCOURSE HAS
20110113023335.000|20110113023339.000|CC1|BECOME SO SHARPLY POLARIZED, AT 
20110113023339.000|20110113023341.000|CC1|A TIME WHEN WE ARE FAR TOO      
20110113023341.000|20110113023344.000|CC1|EAGER TO LAY THE BLAME FOR ALL  
20110113023344.000|20110113023346.000|CC1|THAT AILS THE WORLD AT THE      
20110113023346.000|20110113023347.000|CC1|DEFEAT OF THOSE WHO HAPPEN TO   
20110113023347.000|20110113023353.000|CC1|THINK DIFFERENTLY THAN WE DO, IT
20110113023353.000|20110113023354.000|CC1|IS IMPORTANT FOR US TO PAUSE FOR
20110113023354.000|20110113023356.000|CC1|A MINUTE AND MAKE SURE THAT WE  
20110113023356.000|20110113023359.000|CC1|ARE TALKING WITH EACH OTHER IN A
20110113023359.000|20110113023403.000|CC1|WAY THAT HEALS, NOT IN A WAY    
20110113023403.000|20110113023409.000|CC1|THAT WARNS -- THAT WOUNDS.      
20110113023409.000|20110113023421.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110113023421.000|20110113023423.000|CC1|SCRIPTURE TELLS US THAT THERE IS
20110113023423.000|20110113023427.000|CC1|EVIL IN THE WORLD AND THAT

20110113023438.000|20110113023440.000|CC1|FOR LIGHT AND THEIR             
20110113023440.000|20110113023444.000|CC1|COMPARTMENTS -- AND THERE CAME A
20110113023444.000|20110113023447.000|CC1|DARKNESS."

20110113023450.000|20110113023452.000|CC1|EXPLANATIONS IN THE AFTERMATH.  
20110113023452.000|20110113023454.000|CC1|THE TRUTH IS THAT NO ONE OF US  
20110113023454.000|20110113023457.000|CC1|CAN KNOW EXACTLY WHAT TRIGGERED 
20110113023457.000|20110113023459.000|CC1|THIS VICIOUS ATTACK, NONE OF US

20110113023501.000|20110113023503.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE STOPPED THESE SHOTS

20110113023516.000|20110113023519.000|CC1|THE FACTS BEHIND THIS TRAGEDY   
20110113023519.000|20110113023522.000|CC1|AND WE CANNOT AND WILL NOT BE

20110113023533.000|20110113023535.000|CC1|SUCH VIOLENCE IN THE FUTURE.    
20110113023535.000|20110113023545.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]

20110113023840.000|20110113023845.000|CC1|OR OUR CANADIAN -- OR OUR

20110113023854.000|20110113023855.000|CC1|WE RECOGNIZE IN THE FLEETING    
20110113023855.000|20110113023858.000|CC1|TIME WE HAVE ON THIS EARTH WHAT 
20110113023858.000|20110113023859.000|CC1|MATTERS IS NOT WEALTH OR STATUS 
20110113023859.000|20110113023906.000|CC1|OR POWER OR SAME -- OR FAME, BUT

20110113024506.000|20110113024508.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110113024508.000|20110113024511.000|CC1|FOR ALL OF OUR IMPERFECTIONS, WE
20110113024511.000|20110113024513.000|CC1|ARE FULL OF DECENCY AND         
20110113024513.000|20110113024519.000|CC1|GOODNESS THAT FORCES -- WE ARE
